doc.field: Road Centerlines: Henrico County GIS datasets (datastack)

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library's Scholars' Lab by the Henrico County GIS Coordinator of the County of Henrico, Virginia, USA, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to the infrastructure, service zones, and land use within Henrico County as well as related natural features. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally in the 2003-2004 range, but some datasets may include data that originated earlier. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * County Boundaries * Subdivision * Buildings and Structures (footprints only) * Street and Road Centerlines - street name, additional geocoding/address matching info. * Street Edges * Driveways * Parking * Easements * Barriers (traffic barriers, safety barriers, drainage and flood barriers) * Railroads * Parcels - incl. parcel#, address, ownership, land use, zoning, assessments, pervious seller info, detailed building characteristics (#rooms, heating type, etc.). * Zoning * Magisterial Districts * Spot Elevation Points - ft. amsl. * Tree and Forest Canopy Cover * Soils - incl. USDA/NRCS/SSURGO soil classifications and description. * Rivers, Streams and Bodies of Water * Road and Parcel locater databases * // * More detailed descriptions of the datasets and coding schemes can be found on the Henrico County GIS page (see contact info). Additional metadata/legend files can be found via the "extra resources" UVA link provided. * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
